source.name: Unearthed Arcana: Kits of Old
source.author: Wizards of the Coast
source.description: These character options were introduced in The Complete Fighter's Handbook, and became a mainstay of the rest of the books in the Player's Handbook Rules Supplement series. Though kits were notorious for providing wildly uneven benefits (some offered all-but-unnoticeable improvements, while others turned characters into walking engines of destruction), they did add depth and customization to a game that had previously offered few character choices after 1st level.
